description: This file defines the JSON schema and API specification for the RDKShell plugin, which manages application lifecycle, display, input interception, and system resource reporting in a multimedia platform. It specifies available methods, parameters, and responses, serving as an interface definition rather than executable code.

methods.name: addAnimation
methods.description: Performs a set of animations on application clients.

methods.name: addKeyIntercept
methods.description: Adds a key intercept to route specific key presses to a client application, regardless of focus.

methods.name: addKeyIntercepts
methods.description: Adds multiple key intercepts in a batch to route keys to clients.

methods.name: setKeyIntercepts
methods.description: Sets the list of key intercepts, replacing existing ones.

methods.name: addKeyListener
methods.description: Adds a key listener to an application, enabling it to receive key events bubbled up.

methods.name: addKeyMetadataListener
methods.description: Adds key metadata listeners for enhanced key event info.

methods.name: createDisplay
methods.description: Creates a display for a client application with specified configuration.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Destroys a specified application client.

methods.name: enableInactivityReporting
methods.description: Enables or disables inactivity event reporting.

methods.name: enableKeyRepeats
methods.description: Enables or disables repeating key events when keys are held down.

methods.name: enableLogsFlushing
methods.description: Enables or disables flushing of logs.

methods.name: enableVirtualDisplay
methods.description: Enables or disables virtual display for a client.

methods.name: generateKey
methods.description: Simulates key press and release events for testing.

methods.name: getAvailableTypes
methods.description: Returns a list of application types available on the firmware.

methods.name: getBounds
methods.description: Gets the spatial bounds (x,y,w,h) of a specified client.

methods.name: getClients
methods.description: Retrieves the list of current clients.

methods.name: getCursorSize
methods.description: Returns the current cursor size.

methods.name: getHolePunch
methods.description: Checks if hole-punching (video overlay) is enabled for a client.

methods.name: getLastWakeupKey
methods.description: Returns the last key pressed prior to device wake-up.

methods.name: getLogLevel
methods.description: Returns the current system log level.

methods.name: getLogsFlushingEnabled
methods.description: Checks if log flushing is enabled.

methods.name: getOpacity
methods.description: Returns the opacity level of a client.

methods.name: getScale
methods.description: Retrieves the scale factors (sx, sy) of an application.

methods.name: getScreenResolution
methods.description: Returns the display resolution.

methods.name: getScreenshot
methods.description: Captures a screenshot of the display.

methods.name: getState
methods.description: Returns current states of all applications (e.g., running, suspended).

methods.name: getSystemMemory
methods.description: Provides information about system memory.

methods.name: getSystemResourceInfo
methods.description: Returns resource consumption info for each application.

methods.name: getVirtualDisplayEnabled
methods.description: Checks if virtual display is enabled for a client.

methods.name: getVirtualResolution
methods.description: Returns virtual display resolution for a client.

methods.name: getVisibility
methods.description: Checks if a client is visible.

methods.name: getZOrder
methods.description: Returns clients in current z-order.

methods.name: getGraphicsFrameRate
methods.description: Gets current graphics frame rate.

methods.name: getFocus
methods.description: Gains focus for a specified client.

methods.name: hideAllClients
methods.description: Hides or unhides all clients.

methods.name: hideCursor
methods.description: Hides the mouse cursor.

methods.name: hideFullScreenImage
methods.description: Hides the full-screen image.

methods.name: hideSplashLogo
methods.description: Removes the splash screen.

methods.name: ignoreKeyInputs
methods.description: Blocks or allows user key inputs.

methods.name: injectKey
methods.description: Simulates a key event with specific keycode and modifiers.

methods.name: kill
methods.description: Terminates a specified client process.

methods.name: launch
methods.description: Launches an application by callsign, version, and configuration.

methods.name: launchApplication
methods.description: Launches an application with specific parameters.

methods.name: launchResidentApp
methods.description: Launches the resident application.

methods.name: moveBehind
methods.description: Reorders a client behind another.

methods.name: moveToBack
methods.description: Moves a client to the back of z-order.

methods.name: moveToFront
methods.description: Brings a client to the front.

methods.name: removeAllKeyIntercepts
methods.description: Removes all key intercepts.

methods.name: removeAllKeyListeners
methods.description: Removes all key listeners.

methods.name: removeAnimation
methods.description: Removes active animations for a client.

methods.name: removeKeyIntercept
methods.description: Removes specific key intercept.

methods.name: removeKeyListener
methods.description: Removes key listener for an application.

methods.name: removeKeyMetadataListener
methods.description: Removes key metadata listeners.

methods.name: resetInactivityTime
methods.description: Resets inactivity timer.

methods.name: resumeApplication
methods.description: Resumes a suspended application.

methods.name: scaleToFit
methods.description: Scales a client application to fit bounds.

methods.name: setBounds
methods.description: Sets the bounds of a client application.

methods.name: setKeyIntercepts
methods.description: Defines a list of key intercepts.

methods.name: setCursorSize
methods.description: Sets the cursor size.

methods.name: setFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to the specified client.

methods.name: setHolePunch
methods.description: Enables or disables video hole punching for the specified client.

methods.name: setInactivityInterval
methods.description: Sets the inactivity notification interval.

methods.name: setLogLevel
methods.description: Sets the logging level.

methods.name: setMemoryMonitor
methods.description: Enables or disables RAM memory monitoring on the device. Upon enabling, triggers possible events are onDeviceLowRamWarning, onDeviceCriticallyLowRamWarning, onDeviceLowRamWarningCleared, and onDeviceCriticallyLowRamWarningCleared.

methods.name: setOpacity
methods.description: Sets the opacity of the specified client.

methods.name: setScale
methods.description: Scales an application.

methods.name: setScreenResolution
methods.description: Sets the screen resolution.

methods.name: setTopmost
methods.description: Sets whether the specified client appears above all other clients on the display.

methods.name: setVirtualResolution
methods.description: Sets the virtual resolution for the specified client.

methods.name: setVisibility
methods.description: Sets whether the specified client should be visible.

methods.name: setGraphicsFrameRate
methods.description: Set Graphics Frame Rate.

methods.name: showCursor
methods.description: Shows the cursor on the display using the current cursor size. The cursor automatically disappears after 5 seconds of inactivity.

methods.name: showFullScreenImage
methods.description: Shows the Full Screen Image.

methods.name: showSplashLogo
methods.description: Displays the splash screen.

methods.name: showWatermark
methods.description: Sets whether a watermark shows on the display.

methods.name: suspend
methods.description: Suspends an application.

methods.name: suspendApplication
methods.description: Suspends an application.

methods.name: keyRepeatConfig
methods.description: Customizes key repeats.

methods.name: setAVBlocked
methods.description: adds/removes the list of applications with the given callsigns to/from the blacklist.

methods.name: getBlockedAVApplications
methods.description: Gets a list of blacklisted clients.

methods.name: hibernate
methods.description: Hibernate an application.

methods.name: restore
methods.description: Restore an application.
